channel.title: Please read this!
channel.description:
Ok. Before I begin, please read [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668.0/all.html]this[/url]. SCAR throws out a lot of errors, often when you don't do something right. We can't help you unless you provide the following information:- The script name. The include your using, your computer specs(not always needed) and what you did before and after pressing the play button. Also, often the error can belong in the script, so it isn't your fault it's the script, in this case you should post on the script's thread. I have provided you with a template post witch you can use. This will help us help you.
[code] [b]Script Name: [/b] [b]The script's include: [/b] [b]Computer specs: [/b] [b]Events before the script error: [/b] [/code]
An example for you:-
[b]Script Name: [/b]Monkey autofighter. [b]The script's include: [/b] SRL version 3.6 [b]Computer specs: [/b] [b]Events before the script error: [/b]I pressed play and gave me this error:- Line 2: [Error] (2:1): Unknown identifier 'FightTheMonkeys' in script

item.title: Please read this!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok. Before I begin, please read this. SCAR throws out a lot of errors, often when you don’t do something right. We can’t help you unless you provide the following information:-
The script name. The include your using, your computer specs(not always needed) and what you did before and after pressing the play button. Also, often the error can belong in the script, so it isn’t your fault it’s the script, in this case you should post on the script’s thread. I have provided you with a template post witch you can use. This will help us help you.

[b]Script Name: [/b]
[b]The script's include: [/b]
[b]Computer specs: [/b]
[b]Events before the script error: [/b]

An example for you:-

Script Name: Monkey autofighter.
The script’s include: SRL version 3.6
Computer specs:
Events before the script error: I pressed play and gave me this error:-
Line 2: [Error] (2:1): Unknown identifier ‘FightTheMonkeys’ in script

Read full topic
